titleStmt.title: SII 6.351: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 351. (A.R. No. 68 of 1898). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmātu puṇarap puvimātu vaḷara nāmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpat taṉ nirupatamalar maṉṉavar cūṭamaṉniya Urimaiyāl maṇimuṭi cūṭic ceṅkol ceṉṟu ticaitoṟum vaḷaṟpa veṅkali nikki meyyaṟa n=taḻaippak kaliṅka miriyak kaṭamalai naṭātti valaṅkoḷāḻi varaiyāḻi tiriya Iricuṭāḷavum Orukuṭai niḻaṟṟa vīrasiṁhāsanattu tribhuvanamuḻutumuṭaiyāḷoṭum vīṟṟirun=taruḷiya kopparakecaripaṟmarāna tribhuvanaccakravattikaḷ śrīvikramacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu patinañcāvatu ṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu kāliyūṟkoṭ
ṭattu taniyūr śrīrājeṉtiracoḻaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaaiyom Iraṇakrayāvaṇak kaiyyeḻuttu Uṭaiyār tiruvekampamuṭaiyārkoyilil Ātidāsa caṇḍeśvaratevaṟku nāṅkaḷ viṟṟukkuṭutta pūmiyāvatu yāṇṭu patinmuṉṟāvatu Uṭaiyār tiruvekampamuṭaiyār śrīpaṇṭārattu nāṅkaḷ palicaikkuk koṇṭa kācālum palicaiyālum yāṇṭu patinañcāvatu kāttikaimāsam Ācaṟutiyāka kaṭavomāna kācu Iruṉūṟṟu muppataraiyum śrīpaṇṭārattu Oṭukkaveṇumeṉṟu Ikkoyi ṉmikaḷum śrīmāyeśvārarum kaṇa
kkaruma vantu veṇṭinamaiyil Eṅkaḷūṟku Ikkācu kuṭukka Utavāmaiyil Ikkācu Iruṉūṟṟu muppataraikkum Eṅkaḷur piṭākai yeṇṇaikkūttanallūr kuṭiyiruppu Uṭpaṭat tām peṟṟa nirnilappāṭakam nūṟṟirupattunālaraiye Araikkāl Itil Ittevarkku nāṅkaḷ muṉpu poṉ koṇṭu poliyūṭṭāka viṭṭa tiruvekampaviḷākam nikki m pāṭakam Aṟupattunālum nilan taṇṇi carukaiyilum veṇṇaikkūttanallūr nilam kaiyilum tiruvekampaviḷā
kam pāṭakam Aṟupattu nālaraiyum nāṅkaḷe kaiykkoṇṭu Innilattukku bratikṣettramāka Onṟumukkā lākki veṇṇaikkūttanallūril parivattaṉaiyāka viṭṭa pāṭakam nāṟpatteṭṭe kāle Araikkālum nikki niṉṟa pāṭakam Eḻupattāṟe kālukkum Emmilicainta vilaikkācu Irunūṟṟu muppatukkum nāṅkaḷ kaṭavomāṉa kācu Irunūṟṟu muppataraiyum Itukkutireyattiraviyamāvatākavum kovirājakecaripatmarkku yāṇṭu patinañcāvatu Ittevar
tirunāḷāṉa Irevatināḷ Uṭaiyār tiruvekampamuṭaiyār tiruuṟsavam Eḻuntaruḷukaikku veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku muṉpu nāṅkaḷ poliyūṭṭāl koṇṭa poṉ Aiññūṟṟuk kaḻañcukkum Ivveṇṇaikkūttanallūr kireyattiraviyattukkuc cilavāka viṟṟapāṭakam Eḻupattāṟekālum tiruvekampaviḷākattukkut talaimāṟu nilapparivarttaṉai paṇṇiṉa pāṭakam nāṟpatteṭṭe kāle Araikkālum Ākap pāṭakam nūṟṟirupattu nālaraiye yaraik
kālukkum vanta Iṟaiyili nirvilaikkācukkum maṉaiyuppukkācu Uḷḷiṭṭa kiḻiṟaippāṭṭaṅkaḷukkum Eccoṟu kūṟṟarici veṭṭi muṭṭaiyā ḷuḷḷiṭṭu Eppeṟpaṭṭa cilliṟaikaḷukkum Uṭalāka Ippoṉ koṇṭu Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṟaiyiḻiccikkuṭuttu Ivveṇṇaikkūttanallūril kāṇiUṭaiya kāṇiyāḷarkku pratikṣettiram Appāle kāṇiyākakkuṭuttu Ip
paricukku Orukālāvatum Irukālāvatum mukkālāvatum Icaintu cammatittom Ittevar koyilukku Iṉṟaikku muṉpu mārkaḻittiruvātirai tirunāḷ Āṭiyaruḷukaikku nāṅkaḷ Aḷantuvarukiṟa ney Añañūṟṟu nāḻiyum Ivveṇṇaikkūttanallūrumallatu cempilum kallilum Olaiyalumuḷḷa Ilekyaṅkaḷil Uḷḷanavoṉṟuṅ kaṭavomallātomākavum Ivvūr muṉṉuṭaiyārum paḻamperum tavirttu Ittevarkke kāṇiyāy tiruvekampanallūreṉṉum civanāmattāl
Eṅkaḷur pottakattilum Eṟaṭṭu variyilu miṭṭukkoḷḷakaṭavatāka sammatittu Iṟaiyiḻiccik kuṭuttom mahāsabhaiyom Ivarkaḷ paṇikka Eḻutinen Uttiramelūruṭaiyān villicatiranāna tanmapiriyanen Ivai En Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kurovaceri nārāyaṇapaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ivai kāvaṭṭi tāmotirapaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ivai kāvaṭṭi mātavapaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ivai māṭapocan .
Digital edition of SII 6.351 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
